players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and found out Alice is the mafioso. We need to act fast."
You: "Alice is questioning her own actions and needs some time to think."
Charlie: "I will investigate Bob next. If he's not the mafioso, we need to find out who is."
You: "I'm feeling remorseful about last night and want to clear the air. I believe we should focus on finding the real mafioso among us instead of pointing fingers at each other based on suspicions."
Bob: "Let's work together to uncover the truth. I'm willing to share any information I have, and I hope everyone else will do the same."
